name: light skin tone
note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the light skin tone modifier emoji presents a subtle yet distinct pale peach hue, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges. This representation of fair skin is depicted with gentle highlights that suggest a natural, healthy glow, contributing to its approachable and inclusive visual style across Apple products. It's used to personalize emojis, ensuring representation and fostering a more accurate and relatable digital communication experience on Apple devices.
